date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 March 2024

name: Russell Athletic Womens Essential Short Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I absolutely love working out in the Russell Athletic Women's Cotton Performance T-Shirt. The cotton material provides a comfortable and natural feel against my skin, making it my go-to for exercise sessions. The soft fabric is a major plus, contributing to an overall pleasant wearing experience.However, there's one noticeable downside – the tightness in the shoulders. During arm workouts, I find myself having to hike up the shirt to avoid feeling restricted. I have this in gray and black, both have the same issue. It's a bit frustrating and affects the overall convenience of the T-shirt. Considering this, I would recommend potential buyers to be mindful of the shoulder fit and perhaps consider sizing up for a more comfortable workout experience.On a positive note, the moisture-wicking properties of the fabric are impressive. The T-shirt effectively keeps me dry, even during intense sweat sessions - without the stench from other workout shirts. I appreciate the simplicity of the design, making it versatile for both the gym and casual wear.Despite the shoulder issue, I continue to reach for this T-shirt for its comfort and breathability. The price cannot be beat! It's become a staple in my workout wardrobe, but I hope the brand addresses the shoulder tightness in future designs. If you prioritize the natural feel of cotton during workouts and don't mind a bit of shoulder tightness, this T-shirt is worth considering.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 January 2024

name: Russell Athletic Womens Essential Short Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Está linda la playera, no es para ejercicio, es más para Jeans, es muy cómoda

name: Russell Athletic Womens Essential Short Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: This tshirt ran a little small but I liked that it wasn't the thin material that shows bumps, rolls. It was a nice thickness and the darl green concealed flaws. It was a little stiff and does not have a lot of stretch. I am 5'1", 40DD, size 12P. The large was a little snug but ok. It wasn't as long as other tshirts and I liked that. I am not sure how it will wash. I will hang it to dry and try to stretch it out horizontallya little in the bust. Hopefully it will become less stiff after a few wears and washes. We shall see.

reviews: I absolutely love working out in the Russell Athletic Women's Cotton Performance T-Shirt. The cotton material provides a comfortable and natural feel against my skin, making it my go-to for exercise sessions. The soft fabric is a major plus, contributing to an overall pleasant wearing experience.However, there's one noticeable downside – the tightness in the shoulders. The price cannot be beat! It's become a staple in my workout wardrobe, but I hope the brand addresses the shoulder tightness in future designs.
